title: My account locked!
content:
https://support.mozilla.org/ko/kb/accounts-blocked

I haven't received the verification email because my email is dormant.

When I unlock the dormant email and click the Resend button, the account is locked and it cannot be synced.
creator: wnrdmadmlaneh

title: Importing bookmarks from another browser
content: I used to be able to import bookmarks from Chrome that resulted in a single folder saying its from Chrome and inside the folder were all my bookmarks. That was up to yesterday. Now, it results in each individual file and folder being sent to Firefox instead of in a folder. And when I import those bookmarks from Chrome after making changes in the Chrome bookmark folders, they DONT change in Firefox; the same "old" information is still there. So the import bookmarks from another browser is now totally useless.
creator: spirul

title: The new version of Firefox doesn't work period. I displays a blank main page and doesn't respond to just about anything I do. No browsing, images, no response to input and most of the page option do nothing.
content: Where is the browser function? All I get is a blank page and the input line does nothing but save the address I input.
creator: moorhousejoe1942

title: Passwords not being updated on Firefox
content: Passwords not being updated on Firefox. I have to do it manually. 1.) CHANGING A PASSWORD When I change a PW on a site I get the box to update as I have entered the new PW on the site page I am going into, I click update PW and continue to site.. I am getting a box saying wrong PW. 2.) EDITING PASSWORDS IN FF I goto add ons in FF and check PW...it was NOT UPDATED. I have to edit the PW and start fresh going to the site I want to. A real pain in the Arse. I am using the latest version of FF and before that one as well...same problems... Why hasn't this been fixed?
creator: bobbyray42

title: Suddenly F11/Fullscreen doesn't work.  What could have happened?
content: Just a few minutes ago it was fine. I didn't go into about:config before this.
creator: moz2u

title: Fullscreen mode
content: I have a problem where I somehow press a certain key combination by accident and it sends me to fullscreen mode, and I don't know what I pressed or why this happened but it makes browsing the web a nightmare and I am forced to close Firefox and reopen it because I don't know what made this happen, can you please add some kind of pop-up after fullscreen is initialized to ask if I am sure i want to go fullscreen, or tell me how to go back to normal browsing, of course this would be best if it had a checkbox with options to never see the pop-up again, I ask this because I have been frusterated with this "feature" for years now.
creator: iamsmokingone

title: Webpages do not load nor does the option menu
content:
Firefox opens with a blank page and does not load any websites. The options menu does not come up either.

Other browsers work fine. Tried troubleshooting by restarting, refreshing, reinstalling, restarting in safe mode, scanning for malware.
creator: vvarkey75

title: switched from internet explorer to firefox for ancestry.com but it won't open
content: I uninstalled internet explorer and installed firefox for ancestry.com but it won't open.
creator: scagle8888

title: "Don’t enable HTTPS-Only Mode" not working
content:
My solar inverter, on my local wi-fi network, has an http:// web page for accessing graphs, stats and settings.

Firefox 85.0 (64-bit) will not allow me to access this device, always changing http: to https:, without giving me the option to 'accept the risk and continue', only 'Try again'. I cannot find any way to get around this and access the device.

In the FF options, I have "Don’t enable HTTPS-Only Mode" selected, but it is obviously not working.

How can I access my inverter's web pages?

Thanks, Daniel
creator: dfnojunk

title: Restore previous session will not turn off
content:
since the last update on Firefox it always restores my previous session and all tabs even though I have not selected that option.

How do I stop this from happening?
